full_text: GAZPROM GERMANIA'S BIGGEST GAS STORAGE FACILITY CURRENTLY HAS STORAGE LEVEL OF LESS THAN 1%, WHICH WILL HAVE TO BE RAMPED UP SIGNIFICANTLY BY NOVEMBER - NETWORK REGULATOR CHIEF
